title: Object

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

model.description: The name of model that specifies the object structure.

created.description: The high-precision date/time of object's creation specified in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format `YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss.ffffffZ`.

modified.description: The high-precision date/time of object's last modification in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format `YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss.ffffffZ`.

description: The `object` model gives basic attribution to every data object stored in the platform. It specifies common identification of the objects and their versioning.
